sourcesContent:
Either your email or password was incorrect. Please try again.
Forgot password?
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { UserService } from '../users.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login-component', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'] }) export class LoginComponent implements OnInit { email!: string; password!: string; loggedIn!: boolean; public loginFail = false; constructor(private _router: Router, private _userService: UserService) { } onSubmit() { this._userService.checkLogin(this.email, this.password).subscribe((result) => { this.loggedIn = result; }); if (!this.loggedIn) { this.loginFail = true; } else { this.loginFail = false; sessionStorage.setItem("email", this.email); const test = sessionStorage.getItem("email"); console.log(test); } } ngOnInit(): void { console.log("login") } }
